column2: As your guest at court, §Y[Root.GetTitledName]§! can be sent away if [Root.GetSubjectPronoun] is not a prisoner, a child, or working for you in an official capacity.
Reclaim Charlemagne's legacy as the protector of Rome and found the Holy Roman Empire.
Reclaim Charlemagne's legacy as the protector of Rome and found the Saint-Empire Romain.

column3: Préoccupé de la sécurité de travail

column2: A direct vassal of my liege, §Y[Root.Liege.GetBestName]§!, is my rightful de jure vassal. All of us are at peace.\n
Is NOT Guardian of a child.\n

§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! will be banished from your court and forced to take up residence somewhere else in your realm. [Root.GetSubjectPronounCap] will be very unlikely to accept return invitations.\n\n

§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! will be banished from your court. Because there are no other eligible courts, [Root.GetSubjectPronoun] will leave your realm and will be very unlikely to accept return invitations.\n\n

§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! will be banished from your court and, because [Root.GetSubjectPronoun] is of a different faith, will leave your realm for one of [Root.GetObjectPronoun] own religion. [Root.GetSubjectPronounCap] will be very unlikely to accept return invitations.\n\n
